sourcesContent:
import alumniumCover from './media/alumnium-cover.png';
import altrumCover from './media/altrum-cover.png';
import bootcamp from './media/bootcamp.png.webp'
import octomorphosis from './media/octomorphosis.png'
import travelDevice from './media/travel-device-poster.png'

export const webDevNDes = [
  {
    id: 3,
    name: "Alumnium",
    date: "october 2022 – february 2023",
    role: "web designer",
    media: alumniumCover,
    description:
      "created web design for an education platform. keywords: bright, fresh, simple.",
    link: "https://www.figma.com/file/XSYMVNuXQlJoOuv3Biwpll/alumnium2?node-id=0%3A1&t=KSxaUe7qp96wBsTl-1",
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    name: "Altrum",
    date: "july 2022 – october 2023",
    role: "web designer & front-end developer",
    media: altrumCover,
    description: "web design and front-end development deploying Bootstrap",
    link: "https://altrum-ed.ru",
  },
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "Web Development Bootcamp Works on Udemy",
    date: "june 2022 – october 2022",
    role: "student",
    media: bootcamp,
    description:
      "practiced HTML, CSS, JS and React as well as learned how to deploy SQL and MongoDB.",
    link: "https://www.udemy.com/course/the-complete-web-development-bootcamp/?kw=web+de&src=sac",
  },
];

export const digitalArtNGraphDesign = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "OCTOMORPHOSIS",
    date: "march 2023",
    role: "",
    media: octomorphosis,
    description:
      "created an interactive world of octopus-inspired creatures using p5.js",
    link: "https://editor.p5js.org/zhuanya28/full/h52OYMQZy",
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    name: "Rapid Prototyping Presentation",
    date: "december 2022",
    role: "figma designer",
    media: travelDevice,
    description: "",
  },
];

export const visualArts = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "charcoal exploration",
    date: "december 2019",
    medium: "charcoal on board",
    media: charcoalExperiment,
    description:"The dramatic light was chosen at a stage of taking photograph to convey the evident atmosphere of tension and uneasiness. Moreover, the notion of the coming out- of-darkness figure works well for my goal of depicting loneliness, as it emphasises the absence of other creatures around. Furthermore, implicit light that shines upon the face allows to display the facial expression in detailed manner. The use of space also contributes to the development of the theme of loneliness as it focuses viewer’s attention on the solemn figure in the positive space. The rest of the space is negative and is mainly used to highlight the emptiness of the outer world that represents the reason behind one’s loneliness. The face is placed not in the centre that ‘leaves space’ for the emotion itself. this space symbolises the splashing emotion that fills out the space around. Speaking of contrast that is evidently present in all of the ways of using the formal elements, it conveys the main theme of the artwork: the extreme emotion of serenity that one feels. Rigid and nealry-monotone strokes in the background emphasise the elaborative and chaotic texture of the face. This creates a contrast between the background and foreground, highlighting the isolation of the figure."
  }
  ]
